column1: LJ001-0001|The characteristics of creative people|The characteristics of creative people

column2: then so too has the notion of what it is to be creative.|If creativity has been misunderstood
column3: then so too has the notion of what it is to be creative.

column1: LJ001-0003|It has been assumed that only artists
column3: and media people are creative.|It has been assumed that only artists

column1: LJ001-0004|This is not the case.|This is not the case.

LJ001-0005|It is axiomatic of the idea of being creative that no one person’s list of characteristics will look the same as another’s.|It is axiomatic of the idea of being creative that no one person’s list of characteristics will look the same as another’s.

column2: here are the kind of words and phrases I associate with being creative|For what it is worth
column3: here are the kind of words and phrases I associate with being creative
